src:
Moro: “PF no caminho do completo esclarecimento deste terrível crime ambiental”

01 Nov 2019, 10:00

Sergio Moro comentou a operação da PF sobre os vazamentos de óleo no Nordeste:
“Polícia federal no caminho do completo esclarecimento deste terrível crime ambiental.”
text:
Moro: “PF on the road to the complete clarification of this terrible environmental crime”

01 Nov 2019, 10:00

Sergio Moro commented on PF's operation on oil spills in the Northeast:
“Federal police on the way to the complete clarification of this terrible environmental crime.”
